thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 30 Jan 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: BRIEF-Universal Mcloud Commences Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Units Of Mcloud At $0.35/SHR

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Universal Mcloud Commences Non-Brokered Private Placement Of Units Of Mcloud At $0.35/SHR
text:
Jan 30 (Reuters) - Universal Mcloud Corp:
* UNIVERSAL MCLOUD CORP. ANNOUNCES COMMENCEMENT OF NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT
* UNIVERSAL MCLOUD CORP - COMMENCING A NON-BROKERED PRIVATE PLACEMENT OF UNITS OF MCLOUD AT $0.35 PER UNIT, FOR GROSS PROCEEDS OF UP TO $2.1 MILLION
* UNIVERSAL MCLOUD CORP - INTENDS TO USE NET PROCEEDS FROM OFFERING FOR RECENTLY ANNOUNCED M&A ACTIVITIES, STRATEGIC MARKET EXPANSION Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
